title: My Brother has Turned into a Loli - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Fantasy   Gender Bender   Romance   Yuri
tags: Game Elements   Magic   Male to Female   Transported into a Game World   Younger Sisters
author: Hundred Thousand Mercury   十万水星
description: While the otaku brother was fighting over the PC with his sister, they got drawn into the game world. Soon as they awoke, they found that the god made a mistake with the setting and turned the brother into a blue-haired lolita mage! ...Without a choice, he (she) could only accept the outcome and train to become the strongest with his (her) sister in this RPG world!>
